summary: Attention BNHA writers! Let’s play a game!
title: Attention BNHA writers! Let’s play a game!
body:
I’ll start by writing a paragraph of a fic. You reblog and add a paragraph, and so on and so on! Let’s see what we can come up with!

___

Ever since he was young, Todoroki Shouto understood there were three rules to life. One; be strong, because no one else would be strong for him. Two; take care of yourself, because no one else would take care of him. Three; don’t fall in love, because no one else would love him back. All three rules were important, but Todoroki considered the third rule to be the most important. It was the rule that protected his heart from shattering into tiny pieces.

He never expected the tiny green-haired boy in his class to challenge Todoroki’s third rule so blatantly…

blog.name: ao3feed-shigadabi
blog.title: AO3 feed for Shigaraki Tomura x Dabi
blog.description: Using an IFTTT server to post the feed here.

title: Crossroads
body:
by WinteryFall

Izuku is living his dream; part of the hero course in UA, taught by his idol, crushing on the socially awkward and emotionally constipated but sweet classmate. However, there is a huge secret in his past he doesn’t know about, a secret he ends up running into, literally.

AFO is gone, but he left something behind. Something that doesn’t really know what he wants from his existence. Then he finds out he still has family, but this family is seemingly on the wrong side.

A young hero with unsolved issues, finding solace in the company of the most (potentially) dangerous villain in Japan. Touya finds himself asking hard questions about his path in life, where he belongs.

Words: 3530, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Dabi (My Hero Academia), Todoroki Touya, Todoroki Shouto, Kurogiri (My Hero Academia), Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Toga Himiko, Hikiishi Kenji | Magne, Iguchi Shuuichi | Spinner, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Midoriya Inko
  • Relationships: Midoriya Izuku & Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Dabi & Todoroki Shouto, Kurogiri & Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Midoriya Izuku & Yagi Toshinori | All Might, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead & Dabi, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead/Yamada Hizashi | Present Mic
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe - Brothers, Izuku and Tomura are half siblings, Izuku doesn’t know it, Dabi is Todoroki Touya, Hero Dabi (My Hero Academia), Brotherly Affection, Brotherly Angst, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Fluff and Angst, Big Brother Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Protective Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Protective Dabi (My Hero Academia), Emotional Baggage, Mental Health Issues, unraveling secrets, hero crushing to a villain, Tomura has AFO quirk, But he mainly uses his original, Internal Conflict, Soft Dabi (My Hero Academia), Dabi/Touya needs hugs, Tomura will deliver


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/17865035
